attributes.action: Stop the deportation of Watford football player Al Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Read the article on the BBC. This is on the news at the moment.. 

This kid has had to flee his own family and town to evade being sold into male prostitution in his native Sierra Leone. 

He moved to the UK at 15 and has made a life for himself as a footballer. 

Think of the thousands of illegal immigrants in this country.. Does he really deserve to be sent back? Someone making a life for himself, legally, contributing to our tax system. 

If he's sent back, it really just shows how much of a joke our political/justice system is.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
